Device Requirements:

Minimum i5 13th Generation or Ryzen 5th Generation processor (or higher)
16 GB RAM or more

A stable wired internet connection with a minimum speed of 100 Mbps

2nd monitor is a must-have

We offer $500 USD for experienced BPO hires with at least one year of experience.

We are seeking a long-term customer service representative who is interested in growing with our company. If you are passionate about customer service and administrative work, and you are a detail-oriented individual eager to join a young and dynamic company, this is an excellent opportunity for you. Strong English speaking and writing skills are required.
